txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow all the citizens to fall</rgb>
You must rally terrified soldiers and free civilians trapped by rubble.
Rally terrified soldiers and free civilians trapped by rubble

The screams of the Nazg√ªl and the horrors of battle wear heavily on the soldiers of Gondor, causing some to flee from the wall into the streets below. If they cannot be rallied back to their posts, the defence of Minas Tirith will not hold.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Aid Mithrandir in rallying terrified soldiers
* Free civilians trapped by rubble
